summary: Software engineer with experience in Java, Spring Boot, Kafka, and cloud platforms such as GCP and OCP. Certified GCP Professional Data engineer and GCP Associate Cloud Engineer. Passionate about building scalable and efficient systems and mentoring others to achieve engineering excellence. And good at writing code.

details: Developed microservices using Java 17 and Spring Boot, integrating with Kafka for event-driven architecture
Conducted testing and debugging of microservices to ensure reliability and performance while deployed on OpenShift Cloud Platform (OCP)
Investigated and implemented solutions to import secrets form Harshicorp Vault to OCP Secrets

Designed and implemented PoC microservice in Java 21, integrated with Kafka and Google Pub/Sub to be deployed on Google Kebernetes Engine. This service was selected to be a template for a set of new microservices, part of a new Cloud based Fraud monitoring application
Produced high quality, robust, well tested code for Big Data ETL Spark applications using Scala
Migrated Spark applications from on-prem Haddop clusters to GCP, using Dataproc
Created Airflow DAGs to schedule exectution of Spark applications through Cloud Composer
Mentored junior developers with weekly 1 to 1 and shdowing sessions
Reduced duration of Jenkins jobs triggering tasks through Composer by 30%
Explored use of Google AML AI as part of anit-money laundering checks
DEvelope knowledge of BigQuery dataset creation through Terraform scripts
Led workshops with business analysts and data SMEs to create data mapping for AML AI PoC
Second place achieed in Reboot X HAckathon in December 2023, using Microsoft Azure
Experience using Terraform to deploy infrastructure on GCP
Prepare daily, weekly and monthly MI and date to support workload management for the Anti Money Laundering team within Commercial Bankiing
Schedule AML reviews reviews as per requirements agreed  with senior stakeholders
Automated genereation of daily MI emails to senior management using VBA macros in Excel
Use of SQL to pull and analyse information to answer business queries
This role developed my ability to understand problems form stakeholders' point of view
REview and investigate operational risks and suggest improvements to reduc risks
Built VBA macros to assist operational teams with daily compliance checks
Automate several processes across various teams

My analytical skills and ability to interact with different levels of stakeholders (from administrators to heads of function) with Workplace Pensions, Retirement and Protection, HElth Claims and Bereaved areas helped me develop rapidly in nthis role
Ensure collection of monthly pension premiums for a portfolio of 35 companies, for a total of £ 4 million monthly
Main contact for employers and advisers, answering varied type of requests from multiple parties

I was entrusted with additional tasks, such as quality checking, control checks for unti holdings and box movement investigations. Those tasks are essential to ensure processes are adhered to and avoid potential losses
I assisted in the development and testing a CHAPS app to replace a paper-based process, which was a success and is now used by all administrators to nissue same day CHAPS payments
Built ad hoc Mainframe macros to update properties for bulk of policies using VBA
Investigate Subject Access Requests (SARs) for the Royal Bank of Scotland Group's customers
Source personal data related to the customer
This role developed my ability within a strictly regulated environment, under set deadlines

education.description: Core modules provide deep in engineering and project management. Direct entry in third year was offered to me after successful completion of a two year degree in France

education.degree: DUT Génie Industiel et Maintenance, equivalent of  HND in Industrial Engineering and Maintenance
education.school: Université du Sud Toulon Var, La Garde, France
